Nightshift Gets down from his chair and paces in thought.

" That means all=
 the Primes got a heavy burden on their backs.  That old dragon must've bee=
n a guardian of some sort, and knew that his land was in trouble.  But how =
did he know that he could entrust Tucson with his job?  How did he know tha=
t my pal was so different than the others?  And why didn't Tucson get a pie=
ce of the Matrix but has it's power?  Is he gett'n singled out for some rea=
son?  "

Don't be envious of what you don't have, be grateful for things yo=
u already posses.  Nothing is worth more than family and friends.

On Nov 9=
, 2011, at 7:38 AM, Super Cyclonus <supercyclonus@...> wrote:

> > <O=
LD>
> >
> > Nightshift listens thoughtfully to Lord Elders exlanation and t=
hen remembers
> > something he was told by Yoketron about how important bal=
ance was.
> >
> > " I can see why you're concerned. Balance is everything, =
it's the blood and
> > heart of every planet, according ta Master Yoketron.=
 Upset that and chaos
> > ensues. We gotta stop the chaos before it takes t=
his planet. I think
> > that's why that old dragon approached Tucson.. With=
 his temper'n strength,
> > he can sure make a difference as ta how well th=
is planet is protected. The
> > dragon is wise, strong, and steadfast. He p=
rotects life as if it were his
> > own. That's it.. The dragons cave, I bet=
 we can get a lotta answers if we
> > visit the cave."
> 
> <NEW>
> 
> Ther=
e was a smile from LORD ELDER as he shook his head, "I am not
> talking abo=
ut the ship that just crashed, I am talking about one that
> crashed almost=
 a decade ago, the one that is the reason why we have
> this new Beast Wars=
."
> 
> ELDER gestured broadly, "You see, when that first ship crashed, all=

> the gaurds were killed and it took reinforcements from Cybertron to
> br=
ing at least most of them to justice." There was a sad look on
> ELDER's fa=
ce, "But it also started a colonization of Earth. Maximals
> and even Preda=
cons came to Earth."
> 
> Frowning again ELDER looked at POLAR CLAW who nod=
ded back.
> 
> "You see." LORD ELDER continued, "It was at this point that =
somehow
> Megatron arrived, and of course Optimus Primal and all the rest. =
But
> what we didn't know at that time was that Unicron also had his own
> =
minions here on Earth's moon, assigned to watch the Earth and wait for
> a =
time to attack. And with the arrival of all these . . . " ELDER
> waved his=
 hand in the air dissmissively, " . . . colonists, they awoke
> and the Bea=
st War began in earnest as now the Earth had a bold new
> enemy and we had =
a war now on three fronts."
> 
> Crossing his arms over his chest he began =
to pace, "That was when my
> job became more important than ever."
> 
> (TA=
G)
> 
> Preston
>

d paces in thought.</div><div><br></div><div>" That means all the Primes go=
t a heavy burden on their backs.  That old dragon must've been a guard=
ian of some sort, and knew that his land was in trouble.  But how did =
he know that he could entrust Tucson with his job?  How did he know th=
at my pal was so different than the others?  And why didn't Tucson get=
 a piece of the Matrix but has it's power?  Is he gett'n singled out f=
or some reason?  "</div><div><br>Don't be envious of what you don't ha=

      <p>> <OLD><br>

> Nightshift liste=
ns thoughtfully to Lord Elders exlanation and then remembers<br>

hing he was told by Yoketron about how important balance was.<br>
><br>
=
> " I can see why you're concerned.  Balance is everything, it's the blo=
od and<br>
> heart of every planet, according ta Master Yoketron.  Upset=
 that and chaos<br>
> ensues.  We gotta stop the chaos before it takes t=
his planet.  I think<br>
> that's why that old dragon approached Tucson.=
.  With his temper'n strength,<br>
> he can sure make a difference as ta=
 how well this planet is protected.  The<br>
> dragon is wise, strong, a=
nd steadfast.   He protects life as if it were his<br>
> own.  That's it=
..  The dragons cave, I bet we can get a lotta answers if we<br>

 the cave."<br>
<br>
<NEW><br>
<br>
There was a smile from LORD ELDER=
 as he shook his head, "I am not<br>
talking about the ship that just crash=
ed, I am talking about one that<br>
crashed almost a decade ago, the one th=
at is the reason why we have<br>
this new Beast Wars."<br>
<br>
ELDER gestu=
red broadly, "You see, when that first ship crashed, all<br>
the gaurds wer=
e killed and it took reinforcements from Cybertron to<br>
bring at least mo=
st of them to justice." There was a sad look on<br>
ELDER's face, "But it a=
lso started a colonization of Earth. Maximals<br>
and even Predacons came t=
o Earth."<br>
<br>
Frowning again ELDER looked at POLAR CLAW who nodded bac=
k.<br>
<br>
"You see." LORD ELDER continued, "It was at this point that som=
ehow<br>
Megatron arrived, and of course Optimus Primal and all the rest. B=
ut<br>
what we didn't know at that time was that Unicron also had his own<b=
r>
minions here on Earth's moon, assigned to watch the Earth and wait for<b=
r>
a time to attack. And with the arrival of all these . . . " ELDER<br>
wa=
ved his hand in the air dissmissively, " . . . colonists, they awoke<br>
an=
d the Beast War began in earnest as now the Earth had a bold new<br>
enemy =
and we had a war now on three fronts."<br>
<br>
Crossing his arms over his =
chest he began to pace, "That was when my<br>
job became more important tha=
n ever."<br>
